name: Dice Game (itch) (NelNel)
description:
Use WASD to move

The die does not simulated an actual die, so In order to know what each roll will do, you have to look to the chart on the left side of the screen (In game).

Depending on the side of the die, certain areas of the playing field will disappear. Avoid falling into these areas or touching the enemies to survive as long as possible. However, Enemies can also fall to get them off of the playing field.
